name: privatebin
description: PrivateBin is a self-hosted pastebin where the server has no knowledge of pasted data. Supports client-side encryption, expiration, and password protection for sharing text securely.
features: Client-side encryption: Encrypt data in the browser before sending to the server for zero-knowledge security.
Expiration options: Set automatic deletion after time periods or after first read for temporary sharing.
Password protection: Add optional passwords to pastes for additional access control.
Syntax highlighting: Display code with syntax highlighting for multiple programming languages.
Burn after reading: Automatically delete pastes after they're viewed once for maximum privacy.
File attachments: Upload and share files alongside text with client-side encryption.
Discussion threads: Enable comments on pastes for collaborative discussions while maintaining encryption.
QR code generation: Generate QR codes for easy sharing of paste links on mobile devices.
Markdown support: Format text with Markdown for rich content presentation.
No database required: Optionally store pastes as encrypted files on disk without database dependencies.
Open discussion: Create public pastes that anyone can comment on while preserving anonymity.
API access: Programmatically create and retrieve pastes using a simple API interface.
